posts.author: foojin
posts.content:
Why not post it in the original thread? Now we get v1/2 from so many builds that it (in my opinion) makes it a bit of a mess. Also if you're not sure on builds perhaps you should first post them in build request section?

Just an idea cause i like to browse through this forum looking for complete builds, not version 1 / 2 / 3 etc.

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
I second that, foojin.

Empyre, you've barely joined and you have already more builds to your name than me, Kail, Hip and some of the other people here. And that would be allright, except that maybe 10% of those can be considered optimized and at least 50% are very similar to at least one other of your builds. Basically, you're using the lvl 40 builds section to tweak your builds, and that's not what it's meant for. I have already PMed Kail suggesting he move all your builds to the Build Request section. You have 4 different Monk / Dwarven Defenders, 2 with the same classes. Here you post builds that you have at least tweaked and tested in the training modules and reached a final version, not several alternatives of basically the same build. Nothing personal mate, but TBH you're the reason I haven't posted anything in a long time. People like me work on the builds a lot before posting them, test alternatives and make choices only to see them overlapped and moved to page 2 of this guild by a host of unfinished builds. And that sucks. What Kail suggested to make your last build better was a good TWEAK to your build. That's exactly what the Build Request section is for. Not just to request builds. You can post made-up builds and see what ppl have to say about them before coming up with a final version and posting them here. I know you mean no harm, but you should know how things work.

Take it EZ!

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: Understood, and agreed. Please move these to Build Requests. Please also consider a more clearly-named forum for posting unpolished builds, to avoid others making the same mistake I did.

posts.author: HipMaestro
posts.content:
Empyre65 wrote:Please also consider a more clearly-named forum for posting unpolished builds, to avoid others making the same mistake I did.
Character Builds Posting Rules
Build Request
The place where to ask the experts their take on a build concept.
Seems clear enough to me... an aging, senile old fart who occasionally howls at the moon.
A few months ago, Kail hammered out one that was fairly complete but wanted input before making it official.

Wherever it gets posted, it's best to just keep all the iterations together unless they diverge into totally unique concepts, which is not the case with these. Also, the precise class split is not as important as what is attempting to be achieved, as far as the uniqueness goes. A few levels one way or the other doesn't change the overall goal, which is what players are most interested in anyway.

Besides, I believe the legacy ECB Build Request section was handled in the exact same manner. I recognize, that to some members, it can serve as a venue where one just places an order for a build (e.g."Seeking a build that has uber damage, uber AC, high saves and can kill everything in sight in both PvM & PvP settings. Thanks for any help. ") and waits. But that was never the intent. It's more for investigating possibilities of a concept.

Now, back to our regularly-scheduled program...
